name: JBox
description:
JBox is a 4 player Jackbox knock off that was made as a highschool project.

Each session must have 1 separate host that each player can view and 4 active players.

It features 2 games, the first being picdraw which is a game where you attempt to guess the image someone is drawing, and the second being card battle where you must match white cards up to black cards and vote on your favorite.

It currently works over local networks, if you want to play over the internet you're able to use Hamachi.

There are some known issues with scaling with Cardbattle.
